name: express-ts-node-docker
description: Back end example web application with the [Express](https://expressjs.com/) web framework in TypeScript and running in a [Docker](https://www.docker.com/) container, using Windows 10 Pro.

scripts.docker-build: npm run build && docker build --tag my_docker_hub_user/express-ts-node .
scripts.docker-run-debug: docker run --rm --env PORT=3000 --publish 81:3000 --publish 9229:9229 --detach --name awsome-container-DEBUG my_docker_hub_user/express-ts-node node --inspect=0.0.0.0 src/server.js

author: Daniel Toplak <homer.simpson123@gmx.de>
